original_text:
The beginning of the words of his mouth is foolishness,
    and the end of his talk is evil madness.
korean_text: 그의 입의 말들의 시작은 우매요 그의 입의 결말들은 심히 미친 것이니라

sentences.original_text: The beginning of the words of his mouth is foolishness
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 입에서 나오는 말의 시작은 어리석음입니다.

sentences.original_text: the end of his talk is evil madness
